title: Bug 138175 - Bookmark link set in drill through link should be saved in Hyperlink Options dialog.
OB: When setting a bookmark link in a drill through link, the selected bookmark is not saved in the Hyperlink Options dialog.
EB: When setting a bookmark link in a drill through link, the selected bookmark should be saved and displayed in the Hyperlink Options dialog.
SR:
1. Open the Hyperlink Options dialog.
2. Set a bookmark link in a drill through link.
3. Reopen the Hyperlink Options dialog.

Result: The selected bookmark is gone, but it is saved in the xml source.
Expected result: The target bookmark should be displayed in the Hyperlink Options dialog.
